user.title: Setup Advanced Snapshot
user.description: Configure the directories for snapshots and backups.

abort.config_entry_not_found: The configuration entry was not found.

take_snapshot.name: Take Camera Snapshot
take_snapshot.description: Takes a snapshot from the specified camera, crops it, and saves it with optional text.

camera_entity_id.name: Camera
camera_entity_id.description: The camera from which the snapshot should be taken.

file_path.name: Save Path
file_path.description: Path where the image should be saved.

file_path_backup.name: Backup Save Path
file_path_backup.description: Path where the backup of the image should be saved.

crop.name: Crop
crop.description: Optional crop as a list [x, y, width, height].

add_bar.name: Add Text Bar
add_bar.description: Adds a white bar with text to the bottom of the image.

custom_text_left.name: Custom Text Left
custom_text_left.description: Text that should appear on the left side of the text bar.

custom_text_middle.name: Custom Text Middle
custom_text_middle.description: Text that should appear in the center of the text bar (e.g., an entity value).

custom_text_right.name: Custom Text Right
custom_text_right.description: Text that should appear on the right side of the text bar (e.g., a timestamp).

setting_font_size.name: Font Size
setting_font_size.description: Font size for the text bar.

setting_font_color.name: Font Color
setting_font_color.description: Font color for the text bar.

setting_bar_height.name: Bar Height
setting_bar_height.description: Height of the bar beneath the image.

setting_bar_position.name: Bar Position
setting_bar_position.description: Position of the text bar (top or bottom).
